Title: PhoneyTools
Description: Set of controls and utilities for WP7 development.
HomeWiki:
Get Phoney Tools!

This project has reached 1.0!

You can get the Phoney Tools in three ways:
  • Download the Phoney Binary Release: http://phoney.codeplex.com/releases/view/67347
  • Download the Phoney Source Code http://phoney.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/80d07f6c75c5
    • This includes source and an example application
  • Use NuGet!
    • NuGet package has been released for this project. Just search for Phoney and you'll find it!

Documentation:

Get it here; http://phoney.codeplex.com/documentation

Project Description

This is a project that contains several classes and controls for use with Windows Phone 7 applications. There are plans for:

  • Controls
    • FadingMessage class
    • SelectSwitch Control
    • SimpleLongListSelector Control
    • ClearableTextbox Control
  • Helpers
    • BitlyHelper class
    • GravatarHelper class
    • InstaPaperHelper class
    • InputScopeHelper
    • EnumHelper
  • Other Classes
    • GameTimer class
    • InputPanelProvider
    • MD5Managed class
    • MicrophoneRecorder class
    • ObservableObject class
    • Phone Resources classes
    • PhoneNetworking class
    • PhoneLogger class
    • SoundEffectPlayer class
    • ObstructionDetector class
  • Converters
    • DateTimeConverter
    • MoneyConverter
    • NullVisibilityConverter
    • StringCaseConverter
    • StringFormatConverter
    • UnHtmlConverter
    • VisibilityConverter

Reasoning

These are classes created as part of my building my phone applications including the ones on my blog:

http://wildermuth.com/wp7
